targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_softirq" or r["_field"] == "usage_irq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_softirq" or r["_field"] == "usage_irq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "DESKTOP-V9OL7EV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "internet_speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download" or r["_field"] == "upload")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["server_id"] == "10980")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "internet_speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency" or r["_field"] == "jitter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["server_id"] == "10980")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -24h) // Φιλτράρει τα δεδομένα από τις τελευταίες 24 ώρες
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "Omiros/Home/temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean) // Υπολογίζει το μέσο όρο ανά ώρα
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -24h) // Φιλτράρει τα δεδομένα από τις τελευταίες 24 ώρες
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "Omiros/Work/temperatureIn")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean) // Υπολογίζει το μέσο όρο ανά ώρα
  |> yield(name: "mean")
